```{r}
#Most current Anova Analysis
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggpubr)

here()
```

```{r}
summary(LasVegas)

summary(Pahrump)

summary(Phoenix)

summary(FountainHills)

summary(SanDiego)

summary(Ramona)
```

```{r}
LasVegas.aov <- aov(Year ~ Temp_Avg, data = LasVegas)
summary(LasVegas.aov)
```

```{r}
Pahrump.aov <- aov(Year ~ Temp_Avg, data = Pahrump)
summary(Pahrump.aov)
```

```{r}
Phoenix.aov <- aov(Temp_Avg ~ Year, data = Phoenix)
summary(Phoenix.aov)
plot(Phoenix.aov)

```

```{r}
FountainHills.aov <- aov(Year ~ Temp_Avg, data = FountainHills)
summary(FountainHills.aov)
```

```{r}
SanDiego.aov <- aov(Year ~ Temp_Avg, data = SanDiego)
summary(SanDiego.aov)
```

```{r}
Ramona.aov <- aov(Year ~ Temp_Avg, data = Ramona)
summary(Ramona.aov)
```

```{r}
#attempting merging data
Urban_merged_data <- merge(merge(LasVegas.aov, Phoenix.aov, by = "Year","Temp_Avg"), SanDiego.aov, by = "Year","Temp_Avg")
```

```{Visulaiztion}
# Example of interaction plot
ggline(LasVegas.aov, x = "Year", y = "Temp_Avg", 
       add = c("mean_se", "jitter"), 
       ylab = "Temperature", xlab = "Year")
```
